bibl.title: Close Rick-counters of the Rick Kind

encodingDesc.p: Some small changes to the original transcriptions were made including fixed spelling errors and getting rid of parentheses, brackes, and colons.

body.stage: The Smith family is seen sitting around the table eating breakfast. The viewer at this point doesn't know that this scene is set in a dimension that is not Dimension C-137 with a different Smith family, but this will be apparent at the end of the scene.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: So dad, guess what tomorrow is...

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: No... well, it might be...

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: It is.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Fine, but also, tomorrow is your one year anniversary back in our lives. I'm gonna make you flying saucer-shaped pancakes.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Oh, there's no need to do that, Beth. Regular pancakes are fine.

body.stage: A portal appears on their wall and Evil Rick and Evil Morty emerge from it carrying a gun and a tranquilizer respectively. Evil Rick shoots Rick in the head and kills him. Evil Morty shoots Morty in the shoulder with his tranquilizer and he passes out. Evil Morty then drags Morty across the breakfast table and he and Evil Rick drag Morty through the portal, and the portal disappears. The family screams in horror the entire time.
Opening sequence plays
The Smith family is seen sitting around the table eating breakfast. This scene takes place in Dimension C-137

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Happy anniversary, dad!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Oh, I get it. Regular pancakes are already shaped like flying saucers. takes bite Mmm, I should be making you breakfast for putting up with me.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Should be making us a whole restaurant.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Nonsense, we couldn't be happier to have you around. I just wish I got to see more of you.

body.stage: Three armed Ricks come into the room through a portal

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Rick Sanchez of Earth dimension C-137. You are under arrest for crimes against alternate Ricks by the authority of the transdimensional council of Ricks.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Hey! What the heck?

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Neutralise the Jerry.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Wait, no!

body.stage: Rick 2 shoots at Jerry, freezing him

sp.speaker: Summer
sp.p: Dad!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Dad!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Rick!

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Everybody relax. If I know these a-holes, and I am these a-holes, they just wanna haul me to their stupid clubhouse and waste my time with a bunch of questions. Let's get it over with.

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Bring his mo-belches-orty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Oh, man.

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Leave my belches Morty out of this!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: You lost the right to have a say in these things when you refused to join belches the council.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Wait, wh-wh-wh-what about Jerry?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Will you at least unfreeze my daughter's idiot?

body.stage: Rick 1 unfreezes Jerry. Rick 2 and Rick 3 take Rick through the portal and all exit

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: -give you anything! I have a rare antique coin collection, just don't hurt me! pauses Okay, maybe not antique, but it was a limited minting. They have little R2D2s instead of George Washingtons.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Our son's been abducted!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: You hate me for buying those coins!

body.stage: Trans. Ext Citadel of Ricks
Trans. Int Citadel of Ricks. The three armed Ricks and C-137 Rick and Morty enter through a portal

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Geez, Rick! Wh-what is this place?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: The citadel of Ricks. It's the secret headquarters for the council of Ricks.

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Council of Ricks?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137): As you know, Morty, I've got a lotta enemies in the universe that consider my genius a threat. Galactic terrorists, a few sub-galactic dictators, most of the entire intergalactic government
sp.p: wh-wherever you find people with heads up their asses someone wants a piece of your grandpa. And a lot of versions of me on different timelines had the same problem. So a few thousand versions of me had the INGENIOUS IDEA OF BANDING TOGETHER like a herd of cattle or a school of fish or those people who answer questions on yahoo answers.

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Hey, what do you know? It's a cowboy version of me!

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Geez, you're easy to impress. Yeah, most timelines have a Rick and most Ricks have a Morty. This place is a real who's-who of who's you and me.

sp.speaker: Rick Salesman 1
sp.p: Turn your boring old Morty into a hot fashion statement, with some Morty dazzlers!

sp.speaker: Rick Salesman 2
sp.p: Hey, check this out!

body.stage: Rick Salesman 2 holds up a Morty doll and presses a button in the middle

sp.speaker: Morty Doll
sp.p: Show me the Morty!

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Dumb.

sp.speaker: Rick Salseman 3
sp.p: ‘Scuse me, sir, is your Morty insured? You know, every year hundreds of Mortys are injured in-

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Back off! Not my cup of tea, this place.

body.stage: Trans. Hallway leading to the Council

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: I say the point of being a Rick is being a Rick.

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Save your anti-Rick speech for the council of Ricks, terror-Rick!

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Hey, save your Rick rules for the belches sheep-Ricks, Rick-pig!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Fuck me, pal.

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Fuck you? No no no no no, fuck me!

body.stage: They reach the end of the hallway and the door opens automatically, revealing the council of Ricks

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Bring up the holograms!

body.stage: A screen depicting several dead Ricks appears

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Twenty-seven Ricks brutally murdered in their own timelines. An unprecedented Rick-icidal epidemic. What say you, Earth Rick C-137?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: You think I did this? Why am I the first Rick you pull in every time a Rick stubs his toe?

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: You belches have a history of non-cooperation with the council.

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Yeah, so does the scientist formerly known as Rick! Wh-wh-wh-why isn't he here in handcuffs?

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Because he's dead too!

sp.speaker: Rick crowd
sp.p: No!

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Who else would you have us question? You fit the profile. Of all the Ricks in the central finite curve, you're the malcontent. The rogue.

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: I'm the Rick. And so were the rest of you before you formed this stupid alliance. You wanted to be safe from the government so you became a stupid government. That makes every Rick here less Rick than me.

p.stage: Can you believe this guy? This guy needs to get out of here, etc. Ad lib

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Yeah, murmur it up, d-bags. Now if you'll excuse me, I've got pancakes back home with syrup on top of them. They're about to hit that critical point of syrup absorption that turns the cakes into a gross paste. And I hate to get all Andy Rooney about it, but I think we all like fluffy discs of cake with syrup on top! And I think we also like to be accused of crimes when there's evidence! So as they say in Canada, peace oot!

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Evidence? Good idea. Scan his portal gun!

body.stage: Rick 1 reaches into C-137's lab coat and retrieves his portal gun

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Oh, come on. Don't look at another man's portal gun history. We-we all go to weird places.

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Yes, but it appears you alone have been going to the exact timelines and locations in which the murders occured!

body.stage: A diagram appears on the screen, displaying C-137's portal gun history. Entries for certain dimensions flash green before it finally settles on a select few which flash red

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: What? That's Rick-diculous. I'm obviously being set up!

sp.speaker: Rick Council 1
sp.p: Earth Rick C-137! The council of Ricks sentences you to the machine of unspeakable doom, which swaps your conscious and unconscious minds, rendering your fantasies pointless while everything you know becomes impossible to grasp. Also every ten seconds it stabs your balls.

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: I've heard enough.

body.stage: C-137 elbows Rick 1 and tackles him into Rick 2, taking his gun and shooting through his own and then Morty's handcuffs. The two run away

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Run, Morty!

body.stage: A Morty from the crowd starts to run too

sp.speaker: Crowd rick
sp.p: Uh uh, not you!

body.stage: Trans. back to corridor. Rick and Morty (C-137) are running, and are being chased by Ricks

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Aaaaah!

body.stage: Rick shoots into the side walls with his portal gun. As the chasing Ricks pass, several of them get set on fire, attacked by insects, dragged into the portals by tentacles or hit by falling pumpkins

sp.speaker: Armed Rick 1
sp.p: Nooo!

sp.speaker: Armed Rick 2
sp.p: Arrrrgh! Ahhhh!

sp.speaker: Armed Rick 3
sp.p: Aaaah!

sp.speaker: Armed Ricks 4 and 5
sp.p: Oof!

body.stage: The two reach the end of the corridor, which cuts off to a moveable ramp which is currently down and is blocked by a railing. They leap over. As they fall, Rick C-137 shoots a portal beneath them which they then fall through
Trans. Buttworld. Rick and Morty C-137 fall through a portal onto a large butt mountain. They bounce off and continue running

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Oh! Oooh!

body.stage: Rick C-137 shoots a portal in between two buttcheeks, which they run through, with the other Ricks in hot pursuit
Trans. Pizza dimension. A pizza sits on a couch dialing on a phone, while another is lying down on another couch

sp.speaker: Pizza 1
sp.p: Yeah, I'd like to order one large person with extra people please.

sp.speaker: Pizza 2
sp.p: White people. No no no no no, black people. And hispanic on half.

body.stage: C-137 Rick and Morty run out of a portal and shoot another portal onto the opposite wall, then run through. The Ricks and Mortys chasing them follow
Trans. Greasy grandma world. The dimension is full of greasy grandmas. A banner says “Welcome to greasy grandma world. Population: A whole lot, sonny!”
C-137 Rick and Morty run through, avoiding the grandmas as much as possible. They shoot another portal in the wall and run through. The Ricks and Mortys chasing them follow
Trans. Phone dimension. A phone sits on a pizza dialing on a person, while another is lying down on another pizza

sp.speaker: Phone 1
sp.p: Yes, I'd like to order one large sofa chair with extra chair please.

sp.speaker: Phone 2
sp.p: High chair. No no no no no, recliner! And wheelchair on half.

body.stage: C-137 Rick and Morty run out of a portal and shoot another portal onto the opposite wall, then run through. The Ricks and Mortys chasing them follow
Trans. Doopidoo dimension. Several doopidoo creatures stand around repeating the phrase “Doopidoo” over and over
Rick C-137 shoots several portals into the wall, and enters the last one. The Ricks and Mortys chasing them enter the dimension but don't know which portal to go into

sp.speaker: Armed Rick 6
sp.p: They could have gone into any one of these.

p.stage: Ugh, son of a-, aw geez, aw man, we lost him, etc. Ad lib

body.stage: Trans. Chair dimension. A sofa sits on a person dialing on a pizza, while another is lying down on another person

sp.speaker: Sofa 1
sp.p: Yeah, I'd like to order one large phone with extra phones please.

sp.speaker: Sofa 2
sp.p: Cellphone. No no no no no, rotary! And payphone on half.

body.stage: C-137 Rick and Morty run out of a portal

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: That'll keep ‘em belches busy for a while.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Those guys were wrong, right? You don't- you wouldn't kill yourself... y-yourselves?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: ‘Course not, Morty! How could that profit me? Someone out there is killing Ricks, and the council ain't gonna stop thinking it's me until we clear our names.

body.stage: The two pass a homeless sofa, who's initially drinking but stares at them as they pass and dumps out his bottle

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: By finding the real Rick killer.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: I'm scared, Rick! Maybe we should go home and stockpile weapons like that show Doomsday Preppers.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Not really my style, Morty. Besides, your home is most likely swarming with Ricks right now.

body.stage: Trans. Smith living room. Jerry's reading a newspaper, Summer's on her phone, and a bunch of Ricks and Mortys are searching the place

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Alright, listen, Jerry. If Rick calls, this device is going to trace his location. You just gotta keep ‘em on the phone for thirty seconds or longer.

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Who wants lemonade?

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Oh yeah! Mmm! Oh, delicious!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Beth, belches you're a treasure.

sp.speaker: Rick 3
sp.p: I have a Beth just like you in my belches reality, except you know what? She's not as brilliant or belches attractive!

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Aww, thank belches you!

sp.speaker: All Ricks
sp.p: Ohohoho! She did it! She did it!

body.stage: Phone rings. Rick 4 makes a signal to say they're tracing the signal. Jerry picks it up

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Uh, hello?

sp.speaker: Rick (phone)
sp.p: Hey Jerry, it's Rick.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Rick! Heyy. Haha, what's- what's up?

sp.speaker: Rick (phone)
sp.p: So listen, the heat's on and belches there's nowhere left to turn so Morty and I are just going to fly my spaceship into a black hole.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: What?

sp.speaker: Rick (phone)
sp.p: Is that cool with you, dog?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Rick, no! Mortyyyy!

sp.speaker: Rick 4
sp.p: I got it! The call's coming from... inside the house!

p.stage: Look at his face! I can't believe our daughter married you, too easy, etc. Ad lib

body.stage: Trans. Chair dimension. Rick and Morty are in a restaurant run by chairs

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: The Ricks are probably gonna waste some time messing with Jerry. They won't be able to help themselves. But as soon as they get bored they'll be on to us.

sp.speaker: Chair waiter
sp.p: Phones á la clams, and phonesgetti with phoneballs. Anything else?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, more phonesticks please.

sp.speaker: Phone waiter
sp.p: Right away, sir.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: You know Rick, when I first saw all those Ricks and Mortys, I thought ‘gee, that kinda devalues our bond.' But then I realised that just means that our relationship must be pretty special to span over all those different timelines.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, it's gotta be that way. You're a camouflage.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Camouflage? Wh-wh-what are you talking about, Rick?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Ricks have a very distinct and traceable brainwave due to our genius. The best way to hide from an enemy's radar is to stand near someone with complementary brainwaves that make ours invisible. See, wh-wh-when a Rick is with a Morty, the genius waves get cancelled out by the uh, clears throat Morty waves.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Um... because... our personalities are so different?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Oh, shit dog! My portal gun was hacked remotely Morty, obviously by the real killer to frame me. But I was able to trace the signal. Come on, let's go!

body.stage: The two stand up. As they're about to leave, two Ricks and a Morty enter the restaurant and address the waiter

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Uh-oh!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: ‘Scuse me, we've tracked a pair of dangerous criminals to this exact location. They look exactly like us, so in order to avoid confusion I'm going to mark us each with a red X right now. That way if someone has a gun and we both tell you to shoot the other one because they're the evil one, you'll know who's lying.

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Hey, check it out!

body.stage: Two person-chairs that look like Rick and Morty from behind are beside a table. When the two Ricks rush over to turn them around, it's revealed that they're not

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Dammit!

body.stage: They look out the window, to see C-137 flipping them off from in a police hovercraft. They rush outside, and the waiter follows

sp.speaker: Chair waiter
sp.p: Hey, you didn't pay your bill!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: The red X! Red X!

body.stage: Trans. Green planet. Rick and Morty are flying in the police hovercraft, searching

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Hey, it's a good thing that space outlet had labcoats and your favourite kind of shirt in stock, huh Morty?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Yeah, Rick. I-I heard you the first time. You don't have to keep saying it over and over and over.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Man, this place is wayyy off the grid. This guy does not wanna be found.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Well, if he's a Rick, doesn't he just have to stand by a Morty to hide? I mean, isn't that what Mortys are? Human cloaking devices?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Morty, you're making a bigger deal out of this than it is.

body.stage: In the distance a dome comes into view. Faint yelling can be heard

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Oh my god, Rick, look! There's a bunch of people strapped all over that building!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Not people, Morty. Mortys.

body.stage: As they get closer, it's revealed that the dome is covered top to bottom in naked Mortys, who are strapped to the surface and are being tortured with contraptions that stab their sides constantly. Constant Morty yelling can be heard

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Oh my god... wh-why would somebody do this? It's horrible!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Well, one Morty's enough to hide from the bureaucrats. But you g- you get a whole matrix of Mortys and put ‘em in agonising pain. That creates a pattern that can hide even from other Ricks, motherfucker. I fiddled with a belches concept like this once.

body.stage: They land. Morty stares at Rick

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: On paper, Morty, on paper! I wouldn't do this, it's barbaric overkill. I mean, you could accomplish the same result with like five Mortys and a jumper cable. pauses as Morty glares at him Which I also wouldn't do! I'm just saying, it's bad craftsmanship.

body.stage: Trans. Smith living room. Ricks are playing cards while Mortys watch. Jerry's on his laptop

sp.speaker: Beth
sp.p: Coffee time!

p.stage: Yeah! That's what I like to hear! etc. Ad lib

body.stage: The Ricks run into the kitchen, and the Mortys take the place of the Ricks on the cards table. Doofus Rick enters the house

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Ugh.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Hi Jerry!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Leave me alone, I'm working!

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Oh, you are? Wh-wh-what do you do?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Ugh. I'm- I'm in between advertising jobs.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Advertising? Wow! So, people need help figuring out what to buy and then y-you help them?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: W-well, it's a little more complicated than that...

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Well, I mean, you do it, and you seem like a guy that really has it all together!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Looks around for hiding Ricks Dude, are you... wh- you're being a dick, right?

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Oh gosh, wh- I hope not! I-I-I-I wouldn't want to offend you in any way!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: You're really a Rick?

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Ohoho! Y-of course I am! Just as much as my Morty's a Morty!

body.stage: Doofus Rick's morty waves to Doofus Rick from the poker table

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Hey, he looks a lot like Eric Stoltz from the movie ‘Mask.' You know, the one with Cher in it?

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: That's right, Jerry! He-he's from a reality where everyone is Eric Stoltz mask people! He's Eric Stoltz mask Morty! They assigned him to me because... I never had any kids of my own. But if I did, boy, I'd love ‘em if they were as smart and as successful as you are, Jerry.

body.stage: Ricks return with coffee

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Hey, get a load of this! Jerry's hanging out with doofus Rick.

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Haha, this is perfect.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: I'm not doofus Rick! I'm Rick J-19-Zeta-7!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Oh, is that the timeline where everybody eats poop? Jerry, you know this guy eats poop, right?

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Hey! I don't eat poop! Y-you guys are always so mean to me!

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: I guess it's only fair to tell you now, Jerry... I'm the worst Rick of them all.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: According to who? Other versions of you? If I've learned one thing, it's that before you get anywhere in life, you gotta stop listening to yourself.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Wow, you really are wise, Jerry. I-I guess that's why you work in advertising!

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: The fact that you feel that way makes you the best Rick of them all.

body.stage: Trans. Int dome. Rick and Morty are exploring corridors

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: You don't care about me at all! I'm no different than that jacket you've got on! Y-y-or-or your stupid portal gun! I'm just a tool! I-I'm just an object!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Hey, it's your choice to take it personally, Morty. Now for the love of god, be quiet! The point of this is to get the drop on the guy!

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: You know what Rick, I'll tell you something! I'm more than a human shield!

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, that's right! You are! You're a perfect impenetrable sheet of human armour, Morty! Because you're as dumb as I am smart! Which is why when I say ‘shut up' it's really good advice.

body.stage: Morty tears up. A bunch of lobster-like aliens come out of the nearby corridors and surround them

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Great, nice work, Morty.

body.stage: Rick starts attacking and kicking the aliens. He kills the first wave, but more surround them quickly

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Urrgh.

body.stage: Evil Rick and Evil Morty emerge. Evil Rick is slow clapping

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Ooh, look at you, C-137! You're- aren't you a tough customer?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: The slow clap? Really? Kinda played out, dude.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Not in this dimension it isn't. In fact, hah, I invented it and nobody else has ever even done it here before.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Well lah-dee-dah. slow claps

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Hey, that's mine!

body.stage: Trans. Rick and Morty have been apprehended and are being carried down the corridor by lobster aliens

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: I don't like the look of that Rick, Morty. We gotta escape.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: I'm not gonna help you, Rick. Y-you're a monster.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Don't be Rickdiculous, Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: W-will you stop saying that? It's stupid.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Take his Morty away.

sp.speaker: Evil Morty
sp.p: Come with me.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Yeah, gladly. Geez man, Ricks huh?

body.stage: The two leave to the left. The view changes to another, smaller corridor, which the two walk down

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Hey man, you seem to know how this place works. Is there any way we can... shut down that grid and rescue all those Mortys out there?

sp.speaker: Evil Morty
sp.p: It would be pointless. Mortys have no chance of defeating a Rick.

body.stage: He opens a door

sp.speaker: Evil Morty
sp.p: In here.

body.stage: As Morty walks in, he sees it's filled with a crowd of scared, shivering Mortys. As he tries to leave, Evil Morty closes the door behind him, locking him in
Trans. Evil Rick's lab. Rick is tied to an examination table. An array of computers and other devices are visible. Many of the Mortys from the outside of the dome are visible

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Ahh, isn't it beautiful?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, yeah, looks like payday at Neverland ranch in here. Zing!

sp.speaker: Lobster alien
sp.p: Hehehehehehehehehe.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: That guy got it.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Ah-ah Rick, quiet. You're missing my symphony.

body.stage: Evil Rick presses a button, allowing the sounds of the Mortys in pain to come through. He conducts it for a bit

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Hey, I'll take it over Mumford and Sons. Zip!

sp.speaker: Lobster alien
sp.p: Hehehehehehehehehe.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: This guy is on it!

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: He's not laughing at your dumb jokes, Rick. That's just a random noise it makes every ten seconds.

sp.speaker: Lobster alien
sp.p: Hehehehehehehehehe.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Awww.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: See, Rick, you're not as clever as you think you are. I wanted you to find me. We're not so belch different, you and I.

body.stage: Evil Rick activates a display showing all the Ricks from different timelines

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, duh!

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: See this right here, Rick? I crunched the numbers, I created a spectrum of all the Ricks. I listed ‘em out from most evil to least evil. Here's where I am. And look at right here's where you are, Rick. This guy right here? Super weird.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: I get it. So you want me to team up with you to take down the council of Ricks, right? Is that where you're going with this? ‘Cause that's where I'd be going.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Please. I think I'm doing pretty good on my own. I'm simply going to download the contents of your brain, and then kill you.

body.stage: Trans. Rick's garage. Doofus Rick is mixing chemicals and Jerry is watching

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick: Okay, if we add a little more titanium nitrate, and just a tad of chlorified tartrate
sp.p: ovenless brownies!

body.stage: Jerry takes a brownie, eats it and smiles

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: It's incredible what a gifted mind can accomplish when priorities are in order!

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Well, come on, I can't take all the credit, Jerry. It was your idea. C'mere Jerry!

body.stage: Both hug and laugh

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Hey, uh. C'mere, uh. I-I wanna show you something.

body.stage: They exit the garage and Jerry pulls out a box, then opens it to reveal coins with R2D2s on them

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Okay, look. Everybody makes fun of me for getting these, but... you're a genius scientist, what do you think? There's little R2D2s where the George Washingtons should be!

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: You know Jerry, I'm not gonna tell you that these will increase in value, or even hold their current value. The truth is... you bought ‘em ‘cause you like ‘em. They have value to you. That's what matters.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: tearing up How long are you staying?

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Until we find your Rick.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: hugging doofus Rick I found mine. I found mine.

body.stage: Trans. Morty prison. C-137 Morty is bashing at the door. He is approached by a group of Mortys wearing robes and facepaint

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Help!

sp.speaker: Religious Morty
sp.p: There is no escape, my son. We will find our peace in the next world.

body.stage: Religious Morty offers C-137 a pamphlet titled “The Good Morty”

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: So what? Y-y-y-y-you're just going to give up?

sp.speaker: Religious Morty
sp.p: We're giving in to the power of the One True Morty. One day he will return!

sp.speaker: All religious Mortys
sp.p: Praise the One True Morty!

body.stage: Morty opens “The Good Morty” to the first page, then scoffs and throws it away

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Alright Mortys, listen up! My name is Morty Smith, from Earth dimension C-137! I know you're scared, because I'm scared, but that's no reason to accept our fate. We're Mortys! We're not defined by our relationships to Rick! Our destiny is our own!

sp.speaker: Morty 1
sp.p: This sounds like something the One True Morty might say. I'm sick of being a human shield! I-I-I-I wanna be a gardener!

sp.speaker: Morty 2
sp.p: I wanna write really crazy, intense action novels!

sp.speaker: Hammer Morty
sp.p: I'm more than just a hammer!

sp.speaker: Religious Morty
sp.p: He is the one true Morty! The one true Morty!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: Hooray!

body.stage: The door opens, and a lobster alien walks in

sp.speaker: Lobster alien
sp.p: Hey, keep it down!

sp.speaker: All Mortys
sp.p: Raaaaugh!

body.stage: The Mortys rush the door, breaking free and charging down the corridor
Trans. Evil Rick's lab. Evil Rick is going through Rick's memories on a screen

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: You've lived quite a life, Rick. It's a real shame you're not gonna be around to see it through.

body.stage: The memories change theme to feature Morty in each one. Rick tears up

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: You're crying? Over a Morty?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: No, I'm just allergic to dipshits.

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Ugh, pathetic. We both know that if there's any truth in the universe, it's that Ricks don't care about Mortys.

body.stage: The Mortys break through the door and rush at Evil Rick, killing the lobster aliens, surrounding him and tearing into him

sp.speaker: Evil Rick
sp.p: Do your worst, you little bastards! Kill me! Do it! Do it!

body.stage: Evil Rick dies. Morty C-137 appears and approaches Rick

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Morty! Get me out of this! Come on!

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: You're lucky I'm not a Rick.

body.stage: Morty C-137 unbuckles Rick from the examination table

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Point taken, but this is belches no time for arcs.

body.stage: He presses a button, disengaging the Morty shield. Mortys are released and pour down off the dome. Rick grabs a phone and rings home

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Yeah, hello?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: Hey, what do me and O.J. not have in common?

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Huh? Wh-who is this?

sp.speaker: Rick (C-137)
sp.p: I found the real killer, biitch! Get over here!

body.stage: Trans. Jerry and doofus Rick are playing with legos. Rick 1 opens the door

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: Yo ding-dong! We're done here. Time to go.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Well Jerry, I belches guess this means goodbye.

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: W-w-well, does it have to? Heh, you, you look just like Rick. We could maybe... you know... get rid of him? I'm not saying kill him, necessarily, I-I'm also not saying necessarily not kill him, but-

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Jerry. W-we both know it wouldn't work. It's time to go back to our lives. I love you, Jerry. I love ya.

body.stage: Doofus Rick hugs Jerry and leaves. Jerry makes as if to follow him, then stops and punches a wall. The lego castle they built falls apart
Trans. Evil Rick's lab. The Mortys are still fighting. Ricks from the citadel move in and stop each Morty, pulling them off Evil Rick's corpse and bringing them back to the citadel

sp.speaker: Morty (C-137)
sp.p: Wh-wh-what's gonna happen to all these Mortys?

sp.speaker: Council Rick 1
sp.p: They'll go back to their families, attend school regularly, play video games, date girls... poor little Rickless bastards.

body.stage: Trans. Citadel of Ricks. The council has gathered around C-137 Rick and Morty

sp.speaker: Council Rick 1
sp.p: Earth Rick C-137, the council apologises for its false accusation. And in the way of reparations for our terrible mistake, we would like to compensate you with this voucher for a free replacement Morty, in the event that belches your current belches Morty should-

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Uh, guys? Not a good time. Come on, Morty, let's hit it.

body.stage: Before they leave, Rick takes the voucher anyway
Trans. Citadel outside. Rick and Morty are walking away from the council

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Is it time for arcs yet, Rick? I did a pretty great job back there for a human cloaking device. Saved your ass.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Alright, Morty, don't break an arm jerking yourself off.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Man, I can't believe you, Rick! That right there! Tha-that was a great opportunity to show a little humanity. You know? To connect with me a little?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Hey Morty, you want connection? Go be part of some stupid club like all those dumb Ricks. You know, maybe I don't connect because I'm the Rickest Rick there is. And you know, it would belch go without saying that the Rickest Rick... would have the Mortyest Morty.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: It would go without saying, huh?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Yeah, it would. Did you hear me say it?

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Nah... to himself The Mortyest Morty...

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Just don't get too big for your loafers, Buster Brown. A cocky Morty could lead to some big problems. Could be a real bad thing for everybody.

sp.speaker: Morty
sp.p: Oh yeah, how's that?

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: I-I-I'll explain when you're older.

body.stage: Trans. Evil Rick's lab. Evil Rick is lying in a pool of blood being inspected by Ricks. For the Damaged Coda by Blonde Redhead starts playing in the background

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: What a mess...

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Pride cometh before the fall. I guess he got what he deserved.

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: What is that?

body.stage: Rick 1 turns Evil Rick's head over to reveal wires

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Hand me the laser defibrillator.

sp.speaker: Doofus Rick
sp.p: Hey guys! Uh, c-can I help?

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: No! Go clean the toilets! Maybe you'll make friends with some turds!

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: You make us ashamed to be ourselves!

body.stage: Rick 2 removes the top of Evil Rick's head to reveal electronics woven into his brain. They pull out a chip

sp.speaker: Rick 1
sp.p: My god! I've seen this technology before! This Rick was being controlled remotely, puppeteered by somebody else. This is the receiver!

sp.speaker: Rick 2
sp.p: Yeah, but where's the transmitter?

body.stage: Trans. Citadel of Ricks. Mortys are being loaded into spaceships to be delivered to their respective dimensions
Evil Morty follows them, and removes his eyepatch, revealing the transmitter. He crushes it underfoot and hides the wires, then follows the rest of the Mortys
Credits play
After credits scene: Jerry is sitting in Rick's bedroom, trying not to cry. Rick enters.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Wubbalubbadubdub! Oh. Hey Jerry. Wh-wh-what are you doing in my room, buddy?

sp.speaker: Jerry
sp.p: Nothing! I was just, um, checking the smoke detectors.

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: Alright. Okay, get out.

body.stage: Jerry leaves and goes down to the dining room. He looks outside the window and sees doofus Rick standing in the rain and smiles. Rick appears beside Jerry

sp.speaker: Rick
sp.p: What's that dipshit doing out there? Are you friends with him? You know he eats his own shit, right? Oh my god, this is rich! I've got like belches ten Ricks to call right now!

body.stage: Episode ends

trailer.name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
